titles.title: Stop Child Pornographers and Predators Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect our children from child pornographers.
Stop Child Pornographers and Predators Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Stop Child Pornographers and Predators Act - Amends the federal criminal code to: (1) prohibit the production, distribution, receipt, or possession of visual depictions of prepubescent children (age 12 or younger) engaging in sexually explicit conduct; (2) prohibit the use of pornographic materials to facilitate sex offenses against minors; (3) ban the distribution in the United States of child pornography produced outside the United States; and (4) increase criminal penalties for sex offenders who have a prior sex conviction involving a minor.
